p: On the tenth day after infection and every four days, the parasitemia level of mice was checked. Parasitemia was monitored by examining blood drawn from the tail of mice under the microscope at ×400 magnification using the “Rapid Matching” method of Herbert and Lumsden [ 12]. Monitoring of parasitemia was performed every four days until the 21 st day posttreatment initiation [ 13, 14].
